attributes.action: Have a payment on results system for party funding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the  debate about funding for the political parties, lets clear all the debts, ban all outside funding and have a payment on results system
 £0.50 pence a vote. The more engaged the people get 
the more cash the parties get, you never know they might even get of their 
backsides and do the things we want
